Wow! Great collection of Kirk Douglas movies. I enjoyed the extra documentaries that were included. I would highly recommend this to anyone who loves Kirk Douglas, or would view his fine acting legacy. Well done, on putting this Centennial Collection together. And again, Mr. Kirk Douglas- Happy 100th Birthday, & much gratitude for your wonderful body of work.
